item.title: Trisidia base help, fixing/adding ipban
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

crazyrunezowner:

There is no admin commands, only Commands.java tried adding my Admincommands.java from old source, but still didnt work.

Lol he means under admin commands.
Which is in commands.java

So add the command under admin commands in commnads.java

item.title: Trisidia base help, fixing/adding ipban
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

Did you have the ipban command under “admin command” in your commands file? It may be that it is under owner and therefor it will not work for admins.

Read full topic

item.title: Trisidia base help, fixing/adding ipban
item.dc:creator: @crazyrunezowner crazyrunezowner
item.description:
@crazyrunezowner wrote:

Hello, I need help.
Im trying to make it to Admins can Ipban, and spawn. This is the “ipban” commands I have added.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipban") && c.playerRights >= 1 && c.playerRights <= 3) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(6); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Connection.addIpToBanList(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToFile(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); c.sendMessage("You have IP banned the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" with the host: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got IpBanned By " + c.playerName+ "."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); }

But when I compile, Admins still cant do ::ipban help please.

Read full topic
